user.title: Set up AutoSnooze
user.description: Configure AutoSnooze to temporarily pause automations.

init.title: Duration Buttons
init.description: Set up to 4 quick-select duration buttons for the card. Leave empty to skip.

pause.name: Snooze
pause.description: Snooze automation(s) for a specified duration or until a specific time.

disable_at.name: Disable At
disable_at.description: Schedule when to disable the automation (future datetime).

resume_at.name: Resume At
resume_at.description: Specific datetime when to re-enable the automation.

pause_by_area.name: Snooze by Area
pause_by_area.description: Snooze all automations in a specific area.

disable_at.name: Disable At
disable_at.description: Schedule when to disable the automations.

resume_at.name: Resume At
resume_at.description: Specific datetime when to re-enable the automations.

pause_by_label.name: Snooze by Label
pause_by_label.description: Snooze all automations with a specific label.

label_id.name: Label
label_id.description: Label(s) to match for automations to snooze.

disable_at.name: Disable At
disable_at.description: Schedule when to disable the automations.

resume_at.name: Resume At
resume_at.description: Specific datetime when to re-enable the automations.

cancel_scheduled.name: Cancel Scheduled Snooze
cancel_scheduled.description: Cancel a scheduled snooze before it activates.

entity_id.name: Automation
entity_id.description: Automation(s) with scheduled snoozes to cancel.

adjust.name: Adjust Snooze
adjust.description: Add or subtract time from an active snooze.

days.name: Days
days.description: Number of days to add (negative to subtract).

hours.name: Hours
hours.description: Number of hours to add (negative to subtract).

minutes.name: Minutes
minutes.description: Number of minutes to add (negative to subtract).

invalid_duration.message: Duration must be greater than zero. Please specify at least one of: days, hours, or minutes.

not_automation.message: {entity_id} is not an automation entity. Only entities starting with 'automation.' can be snoozed.

resume_time_past.message: Resume time must be in the future. Please select a date and time that hasn't passed yet.

disable_after_resume.message: Pause time must be before resume time. The automation needs to be paused before it can resume.

invalid_adjustment.message: Adjustment must be non-zero. Please specify at least one non-zero value for days, hours, or minutes.

adjust_time_too_short.message: Adjusted resume time must be at least 1 minute in the future. The snooze cannot be shortened that much.

confirm_required.message: Some selected automations are tagged autosnooze_confirm or detected as critical and require confirmation before snoozing.
